trans-unit.source: Manages the configuration of WCF Data Services.
trans-unit.target: 管理 WCF Data Service 的配置。

trans-unit.source: This example shows the code-behind page for a Northwind-based data service, with access granted to selected entity sets.
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示了基于 Northwind 的数据服务的代码隐藏页面，并将访问权限授予所选实体集。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.DataServiceBehavior" /> object that defines additional behaviors of the data service.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义数据服务的附加行为的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.DataServiceBehavior" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.DataServiceBehavior" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.DataServiceBehavior" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The namespace-qualified name of the type that is enabled for use with the custom data service provider.
trans-unit.target: 启用后能够用于自定义数据服务提供程序的类型的命名空间限定名称。

trans-unit.source: Registers a data type with the data service runtime so that it can be used by a custom data service provider.
trans-unit.target: 向数据服务运行时注册数据类型，使得该数据类型可供自定义数据服务提供程序使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.EnableTypeAccess%2A> method is used to register a type with the data service runtime.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.EnableTypeAccess%2A> 方法用于向数据服务运行时注册类型。

trans-unit.source: After registration, a type can be returned in the properties of an open type.
trans-unit.target: 注册后，该类型可以在开放类型的属性中返回。

trans-unit.source: This makes the type visible in `$metadata` output and usable by the data service.
trans-unit.target: 这使得该类型中可见`$metadata`输出，并且可供数据服务。

trans-unit.source: The supplied `typeName` must be defined in the same format as a type in the data model and not as a CLR type.
trans-unit.target: 必须将提供的 `typeName` 定义为与数据模型中的类型采用相同的格式，而不是采用与 CLR 类型相同的格式。

trans-unit.source: The registered types are added to those types already made available by calling the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.SetEntitySetAccessRule%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 注册的类型将添加到已通过调用 <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.SetEntitySetAccessRule%2A> 方法来提供的类型中。

trans-unit.source: The data service runtime cannot determine what kind of data type the `typeName` maps to until information about the type can be obtained from the underlying provider.
trans-unit.target: 数据服务运行时不能确定 `typeName` 映射到哪种数据类型，直到可从基础提供程序获得有关类型的信息。

trans-unit.source: A value of '*' can be supplied for `typeName`, which matches all types.
trans-unit.target: 可向 `typeName` 提供匹配所有类型的“*”值。

trans-unit.source: When the data service runtime enumerates types or must obtain a type from the underlying data provider, it must first determine whether the type must be visible when the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.SetEntitySetAccessRule%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 当数据服务运行时枚举类型，或必须从基础数据提供程序获取一个类型时，它必须首先确定调用 <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.SetEntitySetAccessRule%2A> 方法时该类型是否必须可见。

trans-unit.source: When the type is not available in this manner, then types registered by using the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.EnableTypeAccess%2A> method are checked.
trans-unit.target: 当无法通过这种方式提供类型时，则可以检查使用 <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.EnableTypeAccess%2A> 方法注册的类型。

trans-unit.source: When a type is not made visible by using either of these mechanisms, that type is not included in the response to a `$metadata` request, and instances of that type are not returned to the client as the response of a request to the data service.
trans-unit.target: 类型不使用任何机制进行可见时, 的响应中不包括该类型`$metadata`请求和该类型的实例不会返回到客户端作为数据服务请求的响应。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.EnableTypeAccess%2A> method can be called many times with the same type name.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用同一类型名称多次调用 <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.EnableTypeAccess%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the data service runtime should convert the type that is contained in the payload to the actual property type that is specified in the request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据服务运行时是否应将负载中所含类型转换为请求中指定的实际属性类型。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示是否执行转换的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of change sets and query operations that are allowed in a single batch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单个批处理中允许的变更集和查询操作的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: A value that is the maximum number of change sets.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示最大变更集数的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the maximum number of changes that can be included in a single change set.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可以包含在单个变更集中的最大更改数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of changes allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允许的最大更改数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of related entities that can be included in a single request by using the <see langword="$expand" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可使用 <see langword="$expand" /> 运算符在单个请求中包括的最大相关实体数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of related entities.
trans-unit.target: 最大相关实体数。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the maximum number of related entities that can be included in an <see langword="$expand" /> path in a single request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可在单个请求的 <see langword="$expand" /> 路径中包括的最大相关实体数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum depth of an <see langword="$expand" /> path.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="$expand" /> 路径的最大深度。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the maximum number of objects to insert that can be contained in a single POST request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单个 POST 请求中能够包含的最大插入对象数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of objects.
trans-unit.target: 最大对象数。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the maximum number of items in each returned collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置每个返回集合中的最大项数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items.
trans-unit.target: 最大项数。

trans-unit.source: This maximum value also applies to nested collections.
trans-unit.target: 此最大值也适用于嵌套集合。

trans-unit.source: Type to add to the collection of known types.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到已知类型的集合中的类型。

trans-unit.source: Adds a type to the list of types that are recognized by the data service.
trans-unit.target: 向可由数据服务识别的类型列表中添加类型。

trans-unit.source: A provider can use the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.RegisterKnownType%2A> method to register a type when it cannot be detected by the runtime by using the default set of rules.
trans-unit.target: 当某一类型无法由运行时使用默认规则集进行检测时，提供程序可以使用 <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.RegisterKnownType%2A> 方法来注册该类型。

trans-unit.source: Name of the entity set for which to set permissions.
trans-unit.target: 要为其设置权限的实体集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Access rights to be granted to this resource, passed as an <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.EntitySetRights" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 要授予此资源的访问权限，可作为 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.EntitySetRights" /> 值传递。

trans-unit.source: Sets the permissions for the specified entity set resource.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的实体集资源设置权限。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of an asterisk (`*`) for the `name` parameter, permissions are set for all entity sets that do not have the permissions explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的值为星号 (`*`) 为`name`参数，将权限设置为未显式设置权限的所有实体集。

trans-unit.source: This example shows the code-behind page for a Northwind-based data service, with access granted to selected entity sets.
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示了基于 Northwind 的数据服务的代码隐藏页面，并将访问权限授予所选实体集。

trans-unit.source: Name of entity set resource for which to set the page size.
trans-unit.target: 要为其设置页面大小的实体集资源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Page size for the entity set resource that is specified in <c>name</c>.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>name</c> 中指定的实体集资源的页大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum page size for an entity set resource.
trans-unit.target: 为实体集资源设置最大页面大小。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of '*' for the `name` parameter, the page size value is set for all entity sets that do not have the page size explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 当您为 `name` 参数指定“*”值时，将为未显式设置页大小的所有实体集设置页大小值。

trans-unit.source: Name of the service operation for which to set permissions.
trans-unit.target: 要为其设置权限的服务操作的名称。

trans-unit.source: Access rights to be granted to this resource, passed as a <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.ServiceOperationRights" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 要授予此资源的访问权限，可作为 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.ServiceOperationRights" /> 值传递。

trans-unit.source: Sets the permissions for the specified service operation.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的服务操作设置权限。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of '*' for the `name` parameter, permissions are set for all service operations that do not have the permissions explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 当您为 `name` 参数指定“*”值时，将为未显式设置权限的所有服务操作设置权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether verbose errors should be returned by the data service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据服务是否应返回详细错误。

trans-unit.source: Whether verbose errors are returned.
trans-unit.target: 是否返回详细错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.UseVerboseErrors%2A> property sets the default verbose error behavior for the whole service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration.UseVerboseErrors%2A> 属性用于设置整个服务的默认详细错误行为。

trans-unit.source: Individual responses can behave differently depending on the value of the <xref:System.Data.Services.HandleExceptionArgs.UseVerboseErrors%2A> property of the arguments to the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601.HandleException%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 个别响应可以具有不同的行为，具体取决于 <xref:System.Data.Services.HandleExceptionArgs.UseVerboseErrors%2A> 类中 <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601.HandleException%2A> 方法的参数的 <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, verbose errors should only be enabled during development, not in production environments,
trans-unit.target: 出于安全方面的考虑，详细错误只应在开发期间启用，不应在生产环境中启用。
